00034 float EnvironmentCamera::GenerateRay(const Sample &sample,
00035                 Ray *ray) const {
00036         ray->o = rayOrigin;
00037         // Generate environment camera ray direction
00038         float theta = M_PI * sample.imageY / film->yResolution;
00039         float phi = 2 * M_PI * sample.imageX / film->xResolution;
00040         Vector dir(sinf(theta) * cosf(phi), cosf(theta),
00041                 sinf(theta) * sinf(phi));
00042         CameraToWorld(dir, &ray->d);
00043         // Set ray time value
00044         ray->time = Lerp(sample.time, ShutterOpen, ShutterClose);
00045         ray->mint = ClipHither;
00046         ray->maxt = ClipYon;
00047         return 1.f;
00048 }
00049 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Camera *CreateCamera(const ParamSet &params,
00050                 const Transform &world2cam, Film *film) {
00051         // Extract common camera parameters from _ParamSet_
00052         float hither = max(1e-4f, params.FindOneFloat("hither", 1e-3f));
00053         float yon = min(params.FindOneFloat("yon", 1e30f), 1e30f);
00054         float shutteropen = params.FindOneFloat("shutteropen", 0.f);
00055         float shutterclose = params.FindOneFloat("shutterclose", 1.f);
00056         float lensradius = params.FindOneFloat("lensradius", 0.f);
00057         float focaldistance = params.FindOneFloat("focaldistance", 1e30f);
00058         float frame = params.FindOneFloat("frameaspectratio",
00059                 float(film->xResolution)/float(film->yResolution));
00060         float screen[4];
00061         if (frame > 1.f) {
00062                 screen[0] = -frame;
00063                 screen[1] =  frame;
00064                 screen[2] = -1.f;
00065                 screen[3] =  1.f;
00066         }
00067         else {
00068                 screen[0] = -1.f;
00069                 screen[1] =  1.f;
00070                 screen[2] = -1.f / frame;
00071                 screen[3] =  1.f / frame;
00072         }
00073         int swi;
00074         const float *sw = params.FindFloat("screenwindow", &swi);
00075         if (sw && swi == 4)
00076                 memcpy(screen, sw, 4*sizeof(float));
00077         (void) lensradius; // don't need this
00078         (void) focaldistance; // don't need this
00079         return new EnvironmentCamera(world2cam, hither, yon,
00080                 shutteropen, shutterclose, film);
00081 }
